titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain women's footwear, valued over $23/pair, covering the ankle, with a coated or laminated textile fabric.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain women's footwear, valued over $23/pair, covering the ankle, with a coated or laminated textile fabric.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of certain women's footwear; and (2) extend the suspension of duty on such footwear.
